amendment.description: To provide funding for the Firefighter Cancer Registry Act of 2018.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3705 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 85 - 0. Record Vote Number: 186.

action.text: Amendment SA 3705 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Menendez to Amendment SA 3695. (consideration: CR S5688-5689; text: CR S5689) To provide funding for the Firefighter Cancer Registry Act of 2018.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3705 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Menendez to Amendment SA 3695.
